channel.title: Router dupe 317
channel.description: okay well yea some kid logged on my server and starting duping?? i had fixed all the trade dupes ect....i asked him how he was doing it and he tells me he drops items and unplugs his router and then it dupes them. any fixes??

item.title: Router dupe 317
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

erm never heard that before
I suggest working on rollbacks,
so that even when you close your run cmd, you have no rollback at all
I think that should make it impossible for that guy to dupe that way o.o

Read full topic
